quagga.input.body:
Ecogas and its affiliates have claims and lawsuits outstanding against them 
totaling over $8.5 million. These cases are, for the most part , suits to 
collect on unpaid debts, for which there are very limited defenses. The 
likelihood of success on the defenses of these cases is small.
